title: Electric two-wheeler maker Sokudo Electric to establish 100 flagship stores across India by FY25
description: Sokudo Electric India aimed to open 100 new flagship stores across India by December 2024. The first phase involved launching 20 stores within six months in Delhi, Uttar Pradesh, and Maharashtra. This expansion was intended to strengthen market presence and account for 60% of their sales by the end of 2024.
